Package uk.ac.ed.inf

Class Buildings

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.Buildings
public class Buildings
extends java.lang.Object
it's the implementation of building class, a building is used to store data of a no-fly-zone building.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()

    • getBuildings

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Buildings> getBuildings()
      get data of no-fly-zone from database and return them as a list of Buildings.
      Returns:
      a list of buildings.

    • noIntersection

      public static boolean noIntersection​(Buildings b, java.awt.geom.Line2D line)
      check whether the input line have intersection with input building. This method will check the line with each edge of the polygon(the building), make sure the line will not intersect with any edge of the building.
      Parameters:
      b - the no-fly-zone building.
      line - the line that need to check whether intersect with no-fly-zone building.
      Returns:
      if no intersect, return true, else, return false.
